cnDescribe1: 私家侦探,被陷害成杀害Webb的凶手,必须在72小时内找到真凶
cnDescribe2: 职业操守极强,擅长推理和证据分析,冷静理性
cnDescribe3: 被Webb利用成"保险侦探",对此感到愤怒但坚持查明真相
enDescribe1: Private detective, framed for Webb's murder, must find the real killer within 72 hours
enDescribe2: Highly professional, skilled in reasoning and evidence analysis, calm and rational
enDescribe3: Used by Webb as an "insurance detective", angry about it but determined to find the truth

cnDescribe1: 《芝加哥先驱报》记者,在案发现场救了Zack
cnDescribe2: 聪明勇敢,有记者的敏锐和资源,与Zack合作调查
cnDescribe3: 一直在调查Webb的非法活动,对真相有强烈的追求欲
enDescribe1: Chicago Herald reporter, saved Zack at the crime scene
enDescribe2: Smart and brave, has reporter's insight and resources, cooperates with Zack
enDescribe3: Has been investigating Webb's illegal activities, has a strong desire for truth

cnTestimony1: 我一直在地下室酒窖工作,什么都没看到
cnTestimony2: 我当时在后台走廊清洁,但很专心工作,什么异常都没发生
cnTestimony3: 是Morrison警官迷晕了Zack先生,我亲眼看到的,但我被威胁不能说出真相
enTestimony1: I was working in the basement wine cellar all night, saw nothing
enTestimony2: I was cleaning the backstage corridor, but focused on work, nothing unusual happened
enTestimony3: It was Officer Morrison who drugged Mr. Zack, I saw it with my own eyes, but I was threatened not to tell the truth
cnDescribe1: 蓝月亮歌舞厅的清洁女工,有个8岁生病的儿子Miguel
cnDescribe2: 因为经济困境被Morrison威胁配合栽赃,内心充满恐惧和愧疚
cnDescribe3: 最终在Zack的劝说下说出真相,展现了母爱的力量和勇气
enDescribe1: Cleaning lady at Blue Moon Dance Hall, has an 8-year-old sick son Miguel
enDescribe2: Threatened by Morrison to cooperate in framing due to financial difficulties, filled with fear and guilt
enDescribe3: Finally tells the truth under Zack's persuasion, showing the power and courage of maternal love

cnTestimony1: 我00:30接到匿名举报电话,立即出警赶到蓝月亮歌舞厅
cnTestimony2: 我是临时接到的报案,走错了路,路上耽误了时间
cnTestimony3: 是我迷晕了Zack,我承认。但我没有杀Webb,我只是受人指使来处理现场
enTestimony1: I received an anonymous tip at 00:30 and immediately rushed to the Blue Moon Dance Hall
enTestimony2: I received a temporary report and got lost on the way, which delayed me
enTestimony3: I drugged Zack, I admit it. But I didn't kill Webb, I was just hired to handle the scene
cnDescribe1: 芝加哥警局警探,负责Webb谋杀案的调查
cnDescribe2: 实际上是腐败警察,欠疤面Tony 5000美元赌债,被神秘人"Whale"收买
cnDescribe3: 为了家人的安全和还清赌债,选择栽赃Zack,处理Webb的尸体现场
enDescribe1: Chicago Police detective, in charge of the Webb murder investigation
enDescribe2: Actually a corrupt cop, owes Scarface Tony $5,000 in gambling debts, bought by the mysterious "Whale"
enDescribe3: Chose to frame Zack and handle Webb's crime scene to protect his family and pay off gambling debts

cnTestimony1: 我11点30分听到枪声,这声枪响和平时黑帮火拼的声音不太一样,只听到了一声
cnTestimony2: 我给Morrison送过东西到他家,从他家到这里开车最多15分钟
cnTestimony3: Webb先生的收入不只来自酒类销售,还有古董买卖生意
enTestimony1: I heard gunshots at 11:30, this gunshot was different from the usual gang firefights, only heard one shot
enTestimony2: I've delivered things to Morrison's house, it takes at most 15 minutes to drive from his house to here
enTestimony3: Mr. Webb's income comes not only from alcohol sales, but also from antique business
cnDescribe1: 蓝月亮歌舞厅的经理,负责账目和日常运营
cnDescribe2: 表面上是普通经理,实际上深度参与Webb的勒索网络,负责伪装账目
cnDescribe3: 对Vivian的处境表示同情,但因为要养活家人而不得不继续工作
enDescribe1: Manager of Blue Moon Dance Hall, responsible for accounts and daily operations
enDescribe2: On the surface a regular manager, actually deeply involved in Webb's extortion network, responsible for disguising accounts
enDescribe3: Sympathizes with Vivian's situation, but has to continue working to support his family

cnTestimony2: 那晚11点05分我来到Webb的会客室门口,他锁了门,我敲门想见他,他说今晚不要再来了
cnTestimony3: 当天晚上我看到有人从后台走向Webb会客室方向
enTestimony1: Morrison arrived at the scene at 01:00
enTestimony2: That night at 11:05 I came to Webb's parlor door, he locked it, I knocked wanting to see him, he said don't come tonight
enTestimony3: That evening I saw someone walking from backstage towards Webb's parlor
cnDescribe1: 蓝月亮歌舞厅的头牌歌女,表面光鲜亮丽
cnDescribe2: 实际上被Webb利用,被迫接近有钱客人套取秘密进行勒索
cnDescribe3: 发现Webb背叛自己与Rita交往后,内心充满仇恨,曾计划杀死Webb但最终未实施
enDescribe1: The top singer at Blue Moon Dance Hall, glamorous on the surface
enDescribe2: Actually exploited by Webb, forced to approach wealthy clients to extract secrets for extortion
enDescribe3: After discovering Webb's betrayal with Rita, filled with hatred, planned to kill Webb but ultimately didn't

cnTestimony1: 我只是这里的厨师,Webb的生意我真的不了解
cnTestimony2: 我和Webb合作很紧密,一直很愉快,从来没有矛盾
cnTestimony3: 当晚11:10到12:00我一直在厨房,有人能证明,而Webb是11:30死的,我不可能作案
enTestimony1: I'm just the chef here, I really don't know about Webb's business
enTestimony2: Webb and I worked closely together, always happily, never had any conflicts
enTestimony3: That night from 11:10 to 12:00 I was in the kitchen, someone can prove it, and Webb died at 11:30, I couldn't have done it
cnDescribe1: 蓝月亮歌舞厅的厨师,表面上是普通员工
cnDescribe2: 实际上是Webb的得力助手,深度参与勒索网络的运作
cnDescribe3: 爱尔兰移民,为了妻子Anna和未出生的孩子能获得合法身份,被"Whale"收买杀害了Webb
enDescribe1: Chef at Blue Moon Dance Hall, seemingly an ordinary employee
enDescribe2: Actually Webb's capable assistant, deeply involved in the extortion network
enDescribe3: Irish immigrant, bought by "Whale" to kill Webb in order to obtain legal status for his wife Anna and unborn child

cnDescribe1: Jimmy的妻子,怀有身孕,不知道丈夫的犯罪行为
cnDescribe2: 善良温柔,Jimmy犯罪的重要动机就是为了给她和孩子更好的生活
cnDescribe3: Jimmy自杀后,向Zack提供了Webb办公室保险柜的密码
enDescribe1: Jimmy's wife, pregnant, unaware of her husband's criminal acts
enDescribe2: Kind and gentle, Jimmy's important motive for crime was to provide a better life for her and their child
enDescribe3: After Jimmy's suicide, provided Zack with the password to Webb's office safe

cnDescribe1: 蓝月亮歌舞厅的老板,表面上做私酒生意
cnDescribe2: 实际上经营着庞大的勒索网络,勒索芝加哥的政商要人
cnDescribe3: 利用Vivian套取秘密,承诺给她未来却背叛她与Rita交往,最终被Jimmy杀害
enDescribe1: Owner of Blue Moon Dance Hall, ostensibly in the bootleg business
enDescribe2: Actually runs a large extortion network, extorting Chicago's political and business elites
enDescribe3: Used Vivian to extract secrets, promised her a future but betrayed her with Rita, ultimately killed by Jimmy

cnTestimony1: Morrison于00:30从家出发,告诉我要去解决一桩紧急案件
enTestimony1: Morrison left home at 00:30, told me he was going to handle an urgent case
cnDescribe1: Morrison的妻子,对丈夫的警察工作深信不疑
cnDescribe2: 善良单纯,完全不知道丈夫的腐败行为
cnDescribe3: 在接受调查时提供了Morrison离家时间的关键证词
enDescribe1: Morrison's wife, trusts her husband's police work completely
enDescribe2: Kind and naive, completely unaware of her husband's corrupt behavior
enDescribe3: Provided key testimony about Morrison's departure time during investigation
